blueprint.description: Installs VIM with a healthy set of
list plugins on almost any platform
blueprint.overview: [VIM](https://www.vim.org/) is a highly configurable text editor that usually runs inside of a terminal. This role installs VIM and adds some secret sauce in the form of a nice collection of useful VIM plugins that were found by looking through various
blueprint.name: VIM (with sauce)
blueprint.title: VIM (with sauce)
